article.title: CENTURION RESURRECTION #01
article.subtitle: Deluxe resurrection of one forgotten treasure
article.paragraph:
Once forgotten and headed for the bins, this 90s mountain bike has been given a second lifeâ€”rescued from obscurity and rebuilt with intention, patience, and a lot of love.
The frame carries the unmistakable spirit of the era: honest steel tubes, purposeful geometry, and a time when mountain bikes were built to survive anything. Scratches and scars remain as quiet reminders of past rides, but beneath them is a structure that deserved far more than abandonment. What was once considered outdated has proven timeless.
